sentences.english: It is a common fallacy to regard school as theonly workshop for the acquisition of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 視學校爲汲取知識的唯一場所是種常見的謬誤。

sentences.english: Draw strength from His Word and be encouraged to endure.
sentences.chinese: 你要從他的話中汲取力量，得到鼓勵而能忍耐。

sentences.english: Fig. 1 Cylinder with gooseneck dip tube.
sentences.chinese: 圖1帶有鵝頸汲取管的鋼瓶。

sentences.english: By drawing on his own culture, Jesus shared his vision of the kingdom of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌也通過汲取自身文化來分享他對上帝國的異像。

sentences.english: Why, I wondered, does no one offer Polish lessons?
sentences.chinese: 我很好奇，爲什麼沒人汲取波蘭人的教訓？

sentences.english: It was certainly from this proximity that the ancient ones drew their divinatory power.
sentences.chinese: 從這裏，遠古的人們汲取他們的占卜能力。

sentences.english: “We are striving to learn from the Japanese event,” says Becker.
sentences.chinese: “我們在竭盡全力從日本事件中汲取教訓，”貝克說。

sentences.english: Note what works for competitors and avoid their pitfalls.
sentences.chinese: 注意汲取對手的成功並避免重蹈他們的覆輒。

sentences.english: There are guesses, that Tesla scooped energy for the devices from an aether.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，特斯拉用裝置從以太中汲取能量。

sentences.english: Family shareholders and board members will learn a great deal from Dr. Pendergast s new book.
sentences.chinese: 家族股東和董事會成員將汲取潘德加博士大量新書。

sentences.english: Extroverts don't tend to enjoy spending time alone, and they get their energy from other people.
sentences.chinese: 他們不喜歡一個人待着，他們從別人的身上汲取力量。

sentences.english: We need to learn lessons from the incident.
sentences.chinese: 我們要從事件中汲取教訓。

sentences.english: Soda will leach the calcium out of your bones and promote osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 蘇打會從你的骨骼中汲取鈣最終導致骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: As a huge open book for them to steal take ideas from.
sentences.chinese: 就像是一本打開的大書，讓他們從裏面偷汲取點子。

sentences.english: The valves are connected to "DIP TUBES" that run to the cylinder sides.
sentences.chinese: 閥門上連接着“汲取管”，汲取管伸入到鋼瓶內側。

sentences.english: The valves are connected to "DIP TUBES" that run to the cylinder sides.
sentences.chinese: 閥門上連接着“汲取管”，汲取管伸入到鋼瓶內側。

definition: to absorb/to draw (a lesson, insight etc)/to assimilate
to take in/to absorb/to admit/to accept
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to pick/to select/to take/to capture (data)/to acquire/to pick up (a signal)
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
to imbue with/to inculcate/to instill into/to teach/to impart/to channel water to another place
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
